context.arch.intelligibility.apps.helloroom
Class HelloRoom

java.lang.Object
  context.apps.ContextModel
      context.arch.intelligibility.apps.helloroom.HelloRoom
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextModel.EnactorsReadyListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
HelloRoomIntelligible
public class HelloRoom
extends ContextModel
implements ContextModel.EnactorsReadyListener

Main class for Hello World context-aware application of a living room smart lamp. It demonstrates four steps to create a simple context-aware application:

  1. Modeling context with Widgets
  2. Modeling reasoning with Enactors
  3. Modeling behavior with Services
  4. Combining models
Running this program would launch a GUI simulation of a room sensor suite with brightness and presence sensors, and lamp light level.
